sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness ailment, with pus and blood, including pieces of coagulated blood looking like chicken or duck liver. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 77: 凡下痢膿 血間雜瘀黑有片，如雞鴨肝，與血皆下者，蠱痢也 , “Whenever discharge with free-flux illness shows pus and blood mixed with pieces of black coagulates looking like chicken or duck liver that are discharged together with the blood, this is gu free-flux illness ”.
